name: PlaygroundLiveViewMessageHandler
desc: A handler you use to send and receive messages between the always-on live view and its corresponding playground page.

items.name: func send(PlaygroundValue)
items.desc: Allows the handler to send a message to a remote object.

items.name: func receive(PlaygroundValue)
items.desc: Allows the handler to receive a live view message from a remote object.

items.name: func liveViewMessageConnectionOpened()
items.desc: Informs the handler that it has connected to a remote object.

items.name: func liveViewMessageConnectionClosed()
items.desc: Informs the handler that the connection between the proxy and the remote object was closed.
